meanings.definition: The act or process of forming a complex
meanings.sent1: The complexation of different elements resulted in a new compound.
meanings.sent2: Chemists study the complexation of molecules to understand their behavior.
meanings.sent3: The complexation of flavors in the dish created a unique taste.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork showed a beautiful complexation of colors and shapes.
meanings.sent5: The complexation of ideas in the book made it a challenging read.

meanings.sent1: The complexation of metals in the alloy gave it strength.
meanings.sent2: The complexation of emotions in the situation made it difficult to understand.
meanings.sent3: The complexation of characters in the play led to hilarious misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: The complexation of relationships in the office was like a tangled web.
meanings.sent5: The complexation of flavors in the dish made it a culinary masterpiece.
